title: Genetic and clinical study of PARK7 in Japanese Parkinson's disease

Author(s): Mayu Ishiguro, Manabu Funayama, Taku Hatano, Hiroshi Nishida, Yuko Wada, Kazuyuki Noda, Masahiko Tomiyama, Hiroyo Yoshino, Yuanzhe Li, Stephanie Ong, Ettore Cioffi, Kenya Nishioka, Nobutaka Hattori
